Package components

Class Supervisor

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sorbonne_u.components.AbstractComponent
      • components.Supervisor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    fr.sorbonne_u.components.ComponentI
    public class Supervisor
extends fr.sorbonne_u.components.AbstractComponent
    The class SGSupervisorComponent implements a supervisor for simulations of the household energy management example.

    Description

    The component creates a simulation architecture and then executes simulation runs. Two architectures are defined:

    1. when the constructors are passed the architecture URI SimulationArchitectures.MIL, they create a MIL simulation architecture;
    2. when the constructors are passed the architecture URI SimulationArchitectures.SIL, they create a SIL simulation architecture.

    Invariant

     invariant              true

    Created on : 2020-01-20

    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant
